description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in PootlePress Caxton – Create Pro page layouts in Gutenberg allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Caxton – Create Pro page layouts in Gutenberg: from n/a through 1.30.1.

product.name: Caxton – Create Pro page layouts in Gutenberg
